item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Zhipeng Zhao
item.description:
I’m a final-year PhD student in ECE department at CMU advised by Prof. James Hoe. I also work closely with other professors at CMU, including Prof. Justine Sherry from Computer Science department and Prof. Vyas Sekar from ECE department.

Prior to joining CMU in 2015, I recieved my B.S degree in 2012 and M.S degree in 2014 both in Eelectrical Engineering from Beihang University, China, advised by Prof. Jun Wang.

I’m an FPGA enthusiast. I have built various FPGA-based systems in past 8 years. In recent years, my research interests lie at the intersection of FPGA and networking.
